DOC.brief_title: Effects Supplement Derived From Palm Oil Cholesterol Levels Chinese Red Yeast Rice Blood
DOC.detailed_description: The current study design determine whether dietary supplement , tocotrienol-enriched fraction palm oil ( TRF ) enhance effect botanical supplement , Chinese Red Yeast Rice ( CRYR ) . Originally , CRYR sell dietary supplement United States 2001 . Since time , CRYR contain monacolin K chemically identical mevinolin sell Mevacor ( patent ) classify unapproved drug . At present time , many brand CRYR sell counter drug store warehouse chain U.S . However , none amount Monacolin K find CRYR subject FDA action 2001 none proven effective lower cholesterol . FDA monitor level monacolin K counter supplement limit approve level less 2 mg effective dos 6 10 mg , study use . two capsule per day capsule contain 3 mg mevinolin Monacolin K. The capsule also contain rice CRYR ferment total mass 600 mg per capsule total daily dose 1200mg . The study originally design focus effect tocotrienol , utilized statin drug . However , subject recruit cholesterol level 200 mg/dl 240 mg/dl want take drug . This make impossible recruit subject . Therefore , current protocol submit use CRYR China know effect serum lipid use study examine whether tocotrienol suppress increase gene expression 3-hydroxy-3-methyl-glutaryl-CoA reductase ( HMG-CoA ) reductase lower serum lipid compare CRYR alone . This objective achieve recruiting individual cholesterol level within l range 200 240 mg/dl drug treatment optional . After acclimation step 1 American Heart Association ( AHA ) diet , subject randomize one four group receive 1 ) Placebo ; 2 ) CRYR alone ; 3 ) TRF alone ; 4 ) CRYR TRF combination 12 week . Fasting lipid include cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL cholesterol measure baseline , 6 week 12 week .

WOCBP include female experienced menarche undergone successful surgical sterilization ( hysterectomy , bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy ) postmenopausal ( defined 12 consecutive month ; woman hormone replacement therapy , amenorrhea , hormone replacement therapy [ HRT ] document serum follicle stimulate hormone [ FSH ] level mIU/mL ( milliInternational unit ) . Even woman use oral contraceptive , hormonal contraceptive ( vaginal product , skin patch , implant injectable product ) , mechanical product intrauterine device barrier method ( diaphragm , condom , spermicide ) prevent pregnancy , practice abstinence partner sterile ( e.g. , vasectomy ) consider childbearing potential . Concomitant administration strong cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) inhibitor ( e.g. , itraconazole , ketoconazole , posaconazole , voriconazole , HIV protease inhibitor , boceprevir , telaprevir , erythromycin , clarithromycin , telithromycin , nefazodone ) Active liver disease unexplained persistent elevation serum transaminases Any subject take large amount grapefruit juice ( least 7 day ) , cyclosporine , gemfibrozil , colchicine , danazol , diltiazem , dronedarone , verapamil , amiodarone , ranolazine Any subject history myopathy/rhabdomyolysis lipidlowering therapy Any subject take vitamin E supplement take antibiotic medication dietary supplement could interfere action tocotrienols Any subject take cholesterol lower medication Any subject lose > 5 % body weight past 3 month . Any subject history gastrointestinal surgery , diabetes mellitus , serious medical condition , chronic hepatitis renal disease , bleed disorder , congestive heart disease , chronic diarrhea disorder , myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft , angioplasty within 6 month prior screen , current diagnosis uncontrolled hypertension ( define BP > 160mmHg , diastolic BP > 95mmHg ) , active chronic gastrointestinal disorder , bulimia , anorexia , laxative abuse , endocrine disease ( except thyroid disease require medication patient wo clinically euthyroid ) indicate medical history routine physical examination . Known HIV positive . Clinical evidence current malignancy exception basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin cervical intraepithelial neoplasia .
